item.description:
Let's go biking on the esplanade. . .

The boston esplanade is a favorite of local bikers, skaters, rollerbladers, walkers and park enthusiasts. There are over 8 miles of nice wide sidewalks, the terrain is very flat (perfect for those of us that like to go leisurely).

So let's go on out enjoy each others company, maybe grab a bite to eat and delight in all the beautiful scenery.


HELMETS ARE MANDATORY, IF YOU DO NOT OWN ONE, BUY ONE, IT WILL SAVE YOUR LIFE
If you come without a helmet you will not ride with us, I take safety very seriously and I do not want to be held responsible for your ignorance.
please wear a helmet. . .

The MBTA allows riders to bring bicycles on board the trains. .
Remember this is always an option

Hope to see you there,
-Bart-
item.how_to_find_us: I will be waiting outside (sports shop side)
item.name: Biking/RollerBlading the Boston Esplanade
